output.sentences: From a distance, it's hard to see the chick wearing the outfit that looks like a space suit.
Its only when you get a closer look that you see the lightbulb attached to the uniform.
She and the scantily clad girl in yellow are in a special dance routine.
At closer glance, you can see how each of them appeal to different tastes in women.
The scantily clad girl always seems to draw a guy close, while the fully covered girl does not.
